note: Sage Howard is a writer, poet, and explorer from the Pacific Northwest. He obsesses over speculative fiction and devours stories that explore the mind and our universe. His passion is with fiction and poetry, but deep down he doubts there is a difference. He is a dabbler and traveler, a finder of four-leaf clovers, and a tinkerer with technology, philosophy, and myth. His time is spent reading, studying, tending Basenjis, and polishing dreams. Find him at lucidmammal.com
